main event: On 27 April 1952, a large flash of green light was observed at Selfridge Air Force Base, Michigan.
interesting points: The green light was reported to be ball-shaped and lasted for about 3-4 seconds., The light was bright enough to reflect in a pool of water., Two other officers also saw a light but thought it was from a beacon overhead., The sighting occurred under clear skies with stars visible., This incident was part of a series of reported sightings around Selfridge AFB.
witness description: The witnesses included a Captain and two other officers at the Air Force Base.
